verses.verse: And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H1129>Build<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>.

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%>; and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> and <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H3320>Stand<s%> by thy <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and I will <S%H3212>go<s%>: peradventure <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H7136>come<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1697>me<s%>; and whatsoever he <S%H7200>showeth<s%> me I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H3212>thee<s%>. And he went to a bare <S%H8205>height<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6186>him<s%>, I have prepared the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and I have <S%H5927>offered<s%> up a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7725>Return<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and thus thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H5324>him<s%>, and, lo, he was standing by his <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, <S%H8269>he<s%>, and all the princes of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, From <S%H758>Aram<s%> hath <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H5148>brought<s%> <S%H4428>me<s%>, The king of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> from the <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of the <S%H6924>East<s%>: <S%H3212>Come<s%>, <S%H779>curse<s%> me <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, And <S%H3212>come<s%>, <S%H2194>defy<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
How <S%H4100><s%> shall I <S%H5344>curse<s%>, whom <S%H410>God<s%> hath not <S%H6895>cursed<s%>? And how shall I <S%H2194>defy<s%>, whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath not <S%H2194>defied<s%>?

For from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1389>him<s%>, And from the hills I <S%H7789>behold<s%> <S%H5971>him<s%>: lo, it is a people that <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%>, And shall not be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

Who can <S%H4487>count<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, Or <S%H4557>number<s%> the <S%H7255>fourth<s%> part of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? Let me <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3477>righteous<s%>, And let my last end be like <S%H319>his<s%>!

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, What hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H3947>me<s%>? I took thee to <S%H6895>curse<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, <S%H1288>and<s%>, behold, thou hast blessed them <S%H1288>altogether<s%>.
And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, Must I not take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> that which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7760>putteth<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>?

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>him<s%>, Come, I pray <S%H312>thee<s%>, with me unto another <S%H4725>place<s%>, from whence thou mayest <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7200>them<s%>; thou shalt see <S%H657>but<s%> the <S%H7097>utmost<s%> part of <S%H7200>them<s%>, and shalt not see them <S%H6895>all<s%>: and curse me them from thence.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> him into the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6839>Zophim<s%>, to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> up a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H3320>Stand<s%> <S%H3541>here<s%> by thy <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, while I <S%H7136>meet<s%> Jehovah <S%H3541>yonder<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7725>Return<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and thus shalt thou <S%H1696>speak<s%>.

And he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5324>him<s%>, and, lo, he was standing by his <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> with <S%H1111>him<s%>. And Balak <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>him<s%>, What hath Jehovah <S%H1696>spoken<s%>?

And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%>; <S%H238>Hearken<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, thou son of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%>:

God <S%H410><s%> is not a <S%H376>man<s%>, that he should <S%H3576>lie<s%>, Neither the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, that he should <S%H5162>repent<s%>: Hath he <S%H559>said<s%>, and will he not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1696>it<s%>? Or hath he spoken, and will he not make it <S%H6965>good<s%>?
Behold <S%H3947><s%>, I have received commandment to <S%H1288>bless<s%>: And he hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%>, and I cannot reverse <S%H7725>it<s%>.

He hath not <S%H5027>beheld<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; Neither hath he <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5999>perverseness<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> is with <S%H8643>him<s%>, And the shout of a king is among <S%H4428>them<s%>.
God <S%H410><s%> bringeth them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; He hath as it were the <S%H8443>strength<s%> of the <S%H7214>wild-ox<s%>.

Surely there is no <S%H5173>enchantment<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; Neither is there any <S%H7081>divination<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H6256>Now<s%> shalt it be <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, What hath <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6466>wrought<s%>!

Behold <S%H5971><s%>, the people riseth <S%H6965>up<s%> as a <S%H3833>lioness<s%>, And as a <S%H3833>lion<s%> doth he lift himself <S%H5375>up<s%>: He shall not lie <S%H7901>down<s%> until he <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H2964>prey<s%>, And <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%>.
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, Neither <S%H5344>curse<s%> them at <S%H6895>all<s%>, nor <S%H1288>bless<s%> them at <S%H1288>all<s%>.

But <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H1696>Told<s%> not I <S%H559>thee<s%>, saying, All that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%>, that I must <S%H6213>do<s%>?

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%> <S%H3947>now<s%>, I will take thee unto <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; peradventure it will <S%H3474>please<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> that thou mayest curse me them from <S%H6895>thence<s%>.
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> unto the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%>, that <S%H8259>looketh<s%> <S%H6440>down<s%> upon the <S%H3452>desert<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H1129>Build<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>.
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> up a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
